turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order I would like to order a iced Starbucks blonde flat white with

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with whole milk, and a tall one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, can you please repeat what kind of coffee you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: blonde flat white iced Starbucks blonde flat white.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a tall iced blonde flat white with extra sugar, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking it up at the Westport, Connecticut Arden Plaza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please repeat from which starbucks you would like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, your coffee will be ready to be picked up in 12 minutes. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
